title: Infosys
description: Joined Infosys to further enhance my career and to take up on new challenges and explore new opportunities in July 2024.

bullets.text: Working for one of the big-4 to develop and enhance their flagship mobility pathway platform, which is a scalable, integrated mobility solution that enables the firm's client s and engagement teams to manage and coordinate coplex mobility services across the end-to-end mobile talent lifecycle via a single platform.
Developed a Bulk Case creation feature for the app that lead to a significant increase in the number of cases created in a short amount of time and reducing manual effort by more than 80%.

title: DXC Technology
description: I joined DXC as an Associate Professional Software Engineer fresher where I got my first professional project with NAB(National Australia Bank) where I learned all about ReactJS front-end web-development from best of the mentors who were from India, Australia, Philippines & Vietnam. Experienced working with agile methodologies, using 3rd party UI Toolkit libraries & constantly evolving client requirements. Later got promoted to Analyst 1 Software Engineering.

bullets.text: Wrote accessible, reusable, interactive and unit-tested react components for clients that can be used across different internal projects
Engineered and maintained code for client primarily using TypeScript, ReactJS,styled-components and GraphQL
Communicate with teams of UI-engineers, UX-designers, testers and clients on day-to-day basis
Utilized MUI (Material-UI) and Kendo React components to design and implement beautiful and user-friendly interfaces
Collaborated with backend developers to structure the correct data responses from the APIs ensuring smoothfrontend-backend integration.
